import React from 'react' import { EditIcon, MenuIcon } from '../icons' import { TableCell, TableRow, Button, Input, } from '@windmill/react-ui' export class Transaction extends React.Component { // TODO: Use setters (check non-empty string) and event handlers to update state & push changes to database render() { return ( {new Date(this.props.transaction.date).toLocaleDateString()}

{this.props.transaction.payee}

{this.props.transaction.description}

 {this.props.transaction.category} {this.props.transaction.balance_change} sats {this.props.transaction.fee} sats
) } } // export default Transaction
